# *Daredevil* (TV Series)

***Marvel's Daredevil*** is an American television series created by [Drew Goddard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drew_Goddard "Drew Goddard") for the streaming service [Netflix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netflix "Netflix"), based on the [Marvel Comics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvel_Comics "Marvel Comics") character [Daredevil](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daredevil_(Marvel_Comics_character) "Daredevil (Marvel Comics character)"). It is set in the [Marvel Cinematic Universe](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvel_Cinematic_Universe "Marvel Cinematic Universe") (MCU), acknowledging the continuity of [the franchise's films](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe_films "List of Marvel Cinematic Universe films"), and was the first [Marvel Netflix series](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvel%27s_Netflix_television_series "Marvel's Netflix television series") leading to the crossover miniseries [*The Defenders*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Defenders_(miniseries) "The Defenders (miniseries)"). *Daredevil* was produced by [Marvel Television](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvel_Television "Marvel Television") in association with [ABC Studios](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ABC_Studios "ABC Studios"). [Steven S. DeKnight](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steven_S._DeKnight "Steven S. DeKnight") served as [showrunner](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Showrunner "Showrunner") for the [first season](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daredevil_(season_1) "Daredevil (season 1)"), with [Doug Petrie](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doug_Petrie "Doug Petrie") and Marco Ramirez taking over as co-showrunners for the [second](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daredevil_(season_2) "Daredevil (season 2)"), and [Erik Oleson](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erik_Oleson "Erik Oleson") joining the series as showrunner for the [third](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daredevil_(season_3) "Daredevil (season 3)"); Goddard served as a consultant for the series.
